source:
TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Aarner is staring mournfully over the railing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_SEQ_00 Schwierigkeitsanpassung
Aarner hat etwas Wichtiges verloren.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_TODO_00<tab>Collect tearstained letters in the Derelicts.
TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tearstained letters to Aarner near the Grand Dame's Parlor.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_TODO_01<tab>Aarner beim Salon der Edlen Dame <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8EA7030502 /var> geben

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_000<tab>My letters! Scattered by the winds! Whose idea was it to build this city with so many breezy walkways?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_000<tab>Eine starke Windböe hat mir einige Briefe aus der Hand gerissen und hinunter nach Wrackstadt geweht. Sie sind eigentlich nicht wertvoll, doch mir bedeuten sie viel.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_001<tab><sigh> No. In this, too, I have no one to blame but myself. They are important to me, though, so might I ask you to search for them? There are three, all told. They likely came to rest in the Derelicts, as these things tend to.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_001<tab>Ich würde sie ja gerne selbst holen, aber ich warte hier auf einen Geschäftspartner. Kannst du bitte in Wrackstadt nach meinen drei <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8EA7030402 /var> suchen?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_002<tab>I would fetch the letters myself, but I'm meant to be meeting someone here, and I don't believe I could stand to disappoint yet another person.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_002<tab>Bitte such in Wrackstadt nach meinen drei <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8EA7030402 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_010<tab>Ah, there you are. Did you have any luck?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_010<tab>Ah, da bist du ja wieder! Hast du meine Briefe gefunden?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_011<tab>You found all three! Wonderful! I cannot possibly express how difficult it would have been for me to rewrite them.
TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_012<tab>Wait... Now I've had a good look at you─are you perchance one of those responsible for freeing us from Vauthry's influence?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_012<tab>Übrigens, warst du nicht in die Unruhen neulich verwickelt?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_013<tab>I thought as much. You have my thanks, for opening my eyes.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_013<tab>Dann möchte ich dir auch dafür danken, dass du und deine Freunde uns die Augen geöffnet habt.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_014<tab>I used to reside in the Crystarium, you know. But the moment that I saw for myself what happens when the eaters take a person... I truly understood, for the first time, that our world teeters on the brink of destruction. I was terrified.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_014<tab>Früher lebte ich in Crystarium. Doch vor einigen Jahren sah ich mit an, wie Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger über hilflose Leute herfielen. Da verlor ich jede Hoffnung<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_015<tab>I knew I could do nothing to change fate. So I came to Eulmore, hoping to forget it instead. Abandoned my work, my family...everything. And I felt no guilt for it, convinced as I was that nothing mattered.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_015<tab>Ich war überzeugt, dass diese Welt dem Untergang geweiht wäre. Aus Angst suchte ich Erlösung in einem vermeintlichen Paradies<var 1D /var>... und floh hierher nach Eulmore<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_016<tab>Now, though, the scales have fallen from my eyes. I've always been a coward, and what I did was a betrayal of the highest order. And I know...I know there's no going back.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_016<tab>Ich war wie besessen, doch jetzt sehe ich klar<var 1D /var>... und schäme mich zutiefst<var 1D /var>... für meine Feigheit und meinen Verrat.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_017<tab>If nothing else, however, I can apologize for what I've done. So I labored over these letters, hoping to convey my contrition. I don't expect forgiveness, but I hope it might mean something, at least, to those I left behind.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_017<tab>Ich kann meiner Familie und meinen Freunden nicht mehr unter die Augen treten<var 1D /var>... aber ich will mich wenigstens bei ihnen entschuldigen. Dafür habe ich diese Briefe geschrieben.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_018<tab>I cannot alter what has been done, but I can change myself. Try to be better. And you will always have my gratitude for giving me the ability to see that─you and your elven friend, both. Thank you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH009_03519_AARNER_000_018<tab>Vielen Dank, dass du sie zurückgeholt hast. Und vielen Dank auch an den jungen Elfen, der sich so für unsere Befreiung eingesetzt hat.
